definition.featurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="feature_container" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_simple_block"><value name="block"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"/><field name="block">CUSTOM:Bacterialmat</field></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Each chunk will try to generate 3 disks of sand</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">80</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_height_triangular"><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">69</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">192</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">This moves the feature so that it doesn't generate in the corner only</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">We try to generate the feature on the ocean floor</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment h="80" pinned="false" w="160">Prevents the feature from generating in other biomes</comment><next><block type="placement_block_predicate_filter"><value name="condition"><block type="block_predicate_is_air"/></value></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block><block type="placement_surface_relative_threshold" x="-132" y="595"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><field name="min">0</field><field name="max">0</field></block></xml>
